15 speakers

Kyiv Data Spring - is the main platform where people interested in big data and machine learning development meet and exchange their experience.


This festival brings together more than 500 people who want to be at the forefront of innovation and seek to achieve the potential of big data technologies. They are managers, developers, marketers, business owners, investors, and scientists.

STARTS IN

4

months

14

days

22

hours

10

minutes

WHERE?

Kyiv, VDNG (Expocenter of Ukraine) March, 11 2017 at 11:00 a.m.

START

NEW KNOWLEDGE

Broaden your horizons and get new knowledge. The latest trends, presentations of the usage of the best instruments, expert insights, unique knowledge at first hand, — all of this and much more on 11 of March, Kyiv Data Spring.

CASES

The conference features real cases and examples of implementing technologies based on data. Some of the experts, who have already implemented innovations in their business, will share their experience of using big data and gain all the possible advantages from this.

NETWORKING

Kyiv Data Spring is your place to get to know the best specialists and experts in big data and machine learning, meet some like-minded people and establish new promising partnerships.

BUSINESS STAGE

Platform for managers, business owners, and marketers who share ideas and cases of implementing big data and machine learning in business.
